## Overview

**`r packageDescription("workshop7", fields = "Title")`:** `r packageDescription("workshop7", fields = "Description")`

Notebooks:

* SRA Workshop 7 Notes: Notes for SRA 2021 Workshop 7, "Monte Carlo simulation and probability bounds analysis in R with hardly any data (Instructors: Ferson & Grey)" held 2021-12-05.
* SRA Workshop 7: Working notebook for SRA 2021 Workshop 7, "Monte Carlo simulation and probability bounds analysis in R with hardly any data (Instructors: Ferson & Grey)"

## Installation

You can install the development version of workshop7 from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("jabenninghoff/workshop7")
```

Or using renv:

``` r
# install.packages("renv")
renv::install("jabenninghoff/workshop7")
```
